ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Hi!
ygData.msgSnippet: Believe me I will, in a month or so anyways. Dawn  wrote: Hi David,Welcome to the group :)  What are you waiting for, get the game!  You need
ygData.messageBody:
Believe me I will, in a month or so anyways.

  Dawn <dlb@...> wrote:

Hi David,
Welcome to the group :)  What are you waiting for, get the game!  You need to be just as hooked as the rest of us.
----- Original Message -----
From: David Langille
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Sunday, February 24, 2002 3:00 AM
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Hi!

Hi

I'm new meself, and I don't even have evequest yet

  reality200169 <dlb@...> wrote:

Hi everyone,

I'm new to the group.  I've been playing EQ since the beginning of
the year so I'd be a "newbie".  I have 2 characters that I play... a
Level 12 Druid named Kanalyn and a Level 9 Beastlord named Analyn.  I
play on Tarew Marr and would love to make some new friends.  I'm also
interested in joining a Guild but have no idea how to go about it or
which ones are available. 

Anyway, I look forward to meeting everyone. 

Reality2001
